title: You Can't Flash The New SKT World Champonship Icon In Game

replies.body:
Hey Zhire,

The SKT World Championship icon will not display the mastery emote in game - just the regular SKT icon. As a reminder, these team emotes will be turned off at the end of patch 5.21.
Aww, that's lame. Understandable, but still lame.
But when I use http://i.imgur.com/X18Br4l.png, it gave me a regular mastery emote.
That's correct. It'll only work for [this](http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZtmMTFNEMG8/Veie0q1-ieI/AAAAAAAAw0E/byUrH12kq9s/s1600/profileIcon924.png) icon.
